meanings.definition: Liveliness or animation in manner or conduct.
meanings.sent1: Her vivacities during the play brought joy to the audience.
meanings.sent2: The children's party was full of vivacities and laughter.
meanings.sent3: His vivacities at the dinner table made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The vivacities of the circus performers amazed the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The vivid vivacities of the street parade stayed in my memory.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being full of life or energy.
meanings.sent1: The garden's vivacities were evident in its colorful flowers.
meanings.sent2: The puppy's vivacities were contagious, making everyone playful.
meanings.sent3: The vivacities of the bustling city streets were invigorating.
meanings.sent4: Her vivacities shone through in her energetic dance performance.
meanings.sent5: The vivacities of nature in springtime are truly refreshing.
